title: FPS Drop
body: My FPS in game goes from 30 to 50. My computer is very good, and for some reason it gets lower FPS than my crap computer. I used to get about 120 FPS on my computer, but one day it just dropped. Now the game is laggy and it is a pain to play. The ping is completely fine, around 30 ms. I need some help on what is gong on, and how to fix it. Because I don't really want to play when it's this choppy/laggy.

replies.body: Your pc might be going through some general wear and tear, and could use a tune up.  There could be other factors too like bad game files, so I suggest going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  This will help tackle possibilities as well as tune things up.  I hope that helps!
My computer is brand new, I just got it a few months ago.
my computer's brand new, also, it is a very good computer, so there's probably somethign wrong with the game, tahnks.
its their 7.4 patch.. they refuse to fix it and have been blaming others
